CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 2) =="AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Akad_Editor__c ,"AO"),True, IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 2) =="CA" && INCLUDES( Conf_Akad_Editor__c ,"CA"),True, IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 3) =="LAO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Akad_Editor__c ,"LAO"),True, IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="Admin_Marketing_HO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Akad_Editor__c ,"Marketing AO"),True, IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 6) =="Spv_AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Akad_Editor__c ,"Spv AO"),True, False)))))
CustomField.label: Conf Akad
